channel.title: Project Xifej
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Project Xifej[/size]
[size=14pt]about:[/size] i decided to start working on an regular allstar server because i felt like there where many different servers but i have yet too see an allstar server that is vastly unique without adding so many useless customs.I am working on a server sided unique quality's and i have added some ideas off a server i play all the way in 2007 and thats a second bank and currency system. I have many other unique ideas too go along with the server but i know there have been a few czar servers pop up here and there this year so i figured why not keep it old school but very fun and unique at the same time.
I have some new ideas but i need feedback on them.
Alt Bank (For example, Loading money and or tokens threw and interface and saving/removing/adding) Three Versions of money bags/tokens and regular gold.
I have many more
I will add the more pictures after i have in-game edits. So far most things have been to deal with stability & Cleaner Code. Though i posted the server packaged. Not the best but it works and for anything else post here.
[code] Updates: 9/10/2012 Moved the CFG files to the correct folder Packaged the server Removed the useless text files IP/Hostname ban handler SYI/Null Protection
Updates: 9/15/2012 Created a menu handler (handles the menus that where inside of client&text handler is very pretty now) Cleaned 500 lines of useless code (preaching for example) Orginised Imports (Eclipse lol)
Updates: 9/17/2012 Second Currency (now is worth 2000M Gold if sold or is the piece of 2b per token) Second Currency Added to woodcutting and theving insted of money (money from the other skills like normal) Rares Removed From Shops (Members area has 1 rare the rest will be implemented by the auth system I'm working on) Exp Rates Lowered (785 * 255 Combat) (Skilling Is alittle faster but wc and theiving is slower becuase you get second currency from it) NpcClipping (almost done, the NPC are not always agresive so i need to fix this too test it fully) Cycle based - Task manager now handling important things Fixed the most of the annoying cmd spam[/code]
Media: // I will add more media when i have better photos these are just the before and after folder.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/x38v21.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2cwszu8.png[/img]

item.title: Project Xifej
item.dc:creator: @xifej xifej
item.description:
@xifej wrote:

[size=18pt]Project Xifej[/size]

[size=14pt]about:[/size]
i decided to start working on an regular allstar server because i felt like there where many different servers but i have yet too see an allstar server that is vastly unique without adding so many useless customs.I am working on a server sided unique quality’s and i have added some ideas off a server i play all the way in 2007 and thats a second bank and currency system. I have many other unique ideas too go along with the server but i know there have been a few czar servers pop up here and there this year so i figured why not keep it old school but very fun and unique at the same time.

I have some new ideas but i need feedback on them.

Alt Bank (For example, Loading money and or tokens threw and interface and saving/removing/adding)
Three Versions of money bags/tokens and regular gold.

I have many more

I will add the more pictures after i have in-game edits. So far most things have been to deal with stability & Cleaner Code. Though i posted the server packaged. Not the best but it works and for anything else post here.

[code]
Updates: 9/10/2012
Moved the CFG files to the correct folder
Packaged the server
Removed the useless text files
IP/Hostname ban handler
SYI/Null Protection

Updates: 9/15/2012
Created a menu handler (handles the menus that where inside of client&text handler is very pretty now)
Cleaned 500 lines of useless code (preaching for example)
Orginised Imports (Eclipse lol)

Updates: 9/17/2012
Second Currency (now is worth 2000M Gold if sold or is the piece of 2b per token)
Second Currency Added to woodcutting and theving insted of money (money from the other skills like normal)
Rares Removed From Shops (Members area has 1 rare the rest will be implemented by the auth system I’m working on)
Exp Rates Lowered (785 * 255 Combat) (Skilling Is alittle faster but wc and theiving is slower becuase you get second currency from it)
NpcClipping (almost done, the NPC are not always agresive so i need to fix this too test it fully)
Cycle based - Task manager now handling important things
Fixed the most of the annoying cmd spam[/code]
